name: FactoReef
description:
How To Install:

  1. Download the files.
  2. Unzip.
  3. Run FactoReef.exe

How To Play:

  • Click on characters to select them
  • Click on cargo to pick them up with selected character.
  • Take care of the cargo and deliver it safe and clean.
  • Save the factory!

A game by Ducktrine Studios

This game was made in 72 hours for MAĞARA JAM #3
